plot: Priceless jewels are stolen from a large jewelry store. The police are about to arrest their main suspect when he is suddenly poisoned.
title: Yu qing ting
plot_es: Priceless jewels are stolen from a large jewelry store. The police are about to arrest their main suspect when he is suddenly poisoned.
plot_en: Priceless jewels are stolen from a large jewelry store. The police are about to arrest their main suspect when he is suddenly poisoned.
